title: Dove Sensitive Beauty Bathing Bar
description: Dove Pink/Rosa Beauty Bathing Bar combines a gentle cleansing formula with our signature ¼ moisturising cream with a delicate pink hue.

title: Dove Original Cream Beauty Bathing Bar

Image.alt: Dove Original Cream Beauty Bathing Bar

description: With ¼ moisturizing cream, richly blended with its mildest cleansers, no other beauty bar has more skin-natural moisturizers than Dove Cream Beauty Bathing Bar. Everyday moisture is the key to beautiful skin. And who knows moisture better than Dove?

title: Dove go fresh moisture Beauty Bathing Bar

Image.alt: Dove go fresh moisture Beauty Bathing Bar

description: Dove go fresh Beauty Bathing Bar combines the refreshing scent of cucumber and green tea with our gentle cleansers and ¼ moisturising cream, so you can enjoy skin that feels smooth and hydrated.

title: Dove Pink/Rosa Beauty Bathing Bar
description: If you have sensitive skin, you know how important it is to choose the right cleansing products. Good sensitive skin care depends on having a cleanser that truly cares for your skin and won't dry it out, and once you find something that works, you stick with it.
